lines.text: You don't have the authority to declare Happy Birthday!
Sheriff, you don't mind if I smoke do you?
I sure as hell do, Brady. You can muck up your own lungs if you want but don't mess with mine, goddammit.

[Brady throws his cigarettes out the window]
Today's your lucky day, Brady.
Oh really, why's that?
Littering's a $500 fine in this state, don't let me catch you doing it again.
Sheriff, you know what they found in those candies you're eating? Rat shit and maggot's eggs!

[Sheriff spits the candy out the window]
Pfffttt!
Oh, now sheriff... littering! That's a $500 fine!
Son of a bitch.
Now maybe, just maybe, we're dealing with a mutant form of slug here, a kind that eats meat!
Did you hear? About Harold and Jean Morris?
Nope, why?
They're dead.
Ah, come on now...
Yeah, I heard it on the news. There was some sort of explosion in their greenhouse. They were both inside.
Wha-Wait a second, how'd this happen?
No one knows.
Ah, Jesus. They were nice people. I liked them a lot.
I know, I did too.

[long pause as Brady looks down at the garden]
So what are you doing out here anyway?
After I've dealt with these slugs, what do you say to we get naked and crazy?
